content: when you have loose gauge and don t carry the tummy yarn under a few body stitches make a magic_ring or your preferred method for starting a round start with off-white yarn round 1 6 single_crochet magic_ring with 6 single_crochet round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x 6 18 in the bottom/first part of the tummy i did not work in the vs when color switching because of the increase pattern there would make it difficult to do round 4 the stitch pattern will be 2 single_crochet increase x 6 24 with the following color changes 2 single_crochet in off-white increase with one in off-white and one in yellow 2 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow 2 single_crochet in off-white increase in off-white 2 single_crochet in off-white increase in yellow 2 single_crochet in yellow increase with one yellow and one off-white 2 single_crochet in off-white increase in off-white in the end you will have 24 stitches 3 in off-white 5 in yellow 6 in off-white 5 in yellow 5 in off-white round 5 the stitch pattern will be 3 single_crochet increase x 6 30 with the following color changes 3 single_crochet in off-white increase with one in off-white and one in yellow 3 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 1 single_crochet in off-white increase in off-white 1 single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow 3 single_crochet in yellow increase with one in yellow and one in off-white 3 single_crochet in off-white increase in off-white in the end you will have 30 stitches 4 in off-white 7 in yellow 6 in off-white 7 in yellow 6 in off-white pokeball to dragonite reversible pattern by the nerd gremlin round 6 the stitch pattern will be 4 single_crochet increase x 6 36 with the following color changes 4 single_crochet in off-white increase with one in off-white and one in yellow 4 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow 2 single_crochet in yellow single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row single_crochet in off-white increase in off-white single_crochet in off-white single_crochet in off-white but insert the hook into the lower v of the off-white stitch in the previous row 2 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow 4 single_crochet in yellow increase with one in yellow and one in off-white 4 single_crochet in off-white increase in off-white in the end you will have 36 stitches 5 in off-white 9 in yellow 6 in off-white 9 in yellow 7 in off-white round 7 the stitch pattern will be 5 single_crochet increase x 6 42 with the following color changes 5 single_crochet in off-white increase with one in off-white and one in yellow 5 single_crochet in yellow increase in yellow
